declarations.description:
A web component for block and inline content warnings.

Based on the original concept: https://codepen.io/aarongustafson/pen/QWZpqPe
declarations.name: ContentWarningElement

cssParts.description: The warning overlay (same element as button)
cssParts.name: overlay

cssParts.description: The warning type text span (e.g., "violence spoilers")
cssParts.name: label-type

cssParts.description: The suffix text span (e.g., "Click to reveal")
cssParts.name: label-suffix

slots.description: Default slot for the content that needs a warning

members.name: type
members.description: Space-separated list of warning types (e.g., "violence spoilers")

members.name: labelPrefix
members.description: The prefix text for the warning label (default: "Content Warning")

members.name: labelSuffix
members.description: The suffix text for the warning label (default: "Click to reveal"). Set to "false" to hide.

members.name: revealed
members.description: Whether the content has been revealed

events.name: content-warning:revealed
events.description: Fired when the content is revealed by the user

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Space-separated list of warning types (e.g., "violence spoilers")

attributes.name: label-prefix
attributes.description: The prefix text for the warning label (default: "Content Warning")

attributes.name: label-suffix
attributes.description: The suffix text for the warning label (default: "Click to reveal"). Set to "false" to hide.

attributes.name: inline
attributes.description: Display the warning inline instead of as a block overlay
